abstract: The nation’s largest maker of implanted heart devices said a component in its most recent defibrillator has malfunctioned in hundreds of patients and may have contributed to five deaths.
snippet: The nation’s largest maker of implanted heart devices said a component in its most recent defibrillator has malfunctioned in hundreds of patients and may have contributed to five deaths.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s largest maker of implanted heart devices, Medtronic, said yesterday that it was urging doctors to stop using a crucial component in its most recent defibrillator models because it was prone to a defect that has caused malfunctions in hundreds of patients and may have contributed to five deaths.

headline.main: Patients Warned as Maker Halts Sale of Heart Implant Part
headline.print_headline: Heart Patients Warned as Maker Halts Sale of Implant Component
